name: Road to Berlin. IL-2 Shturmovik - Combat Flight Simulator of Infinite Sky Gunship and Tanks Hunter
name_original: Road to Berlin. IL-2 Shturmovik - Combat Flight Simulator of Infinite Sky Gunship and Tanks Hunter
description:
***** iPad Game of December 2014!!! ***** Editors Choice Best New Indie Games
* " This is a must-have " - Best New Indie Games (5 / 5)
* " IL-2 Shturmovik is a fast-paced game that will leave you screaming in frustration, but you’ll keep coming back for more" - Best iOS Apps Magazine ( 4.5/5 )
* " The graphics are excellent, the controls easy to use, and best of all, it's endlessly fun " - AppZone ( 8.5 / 10 )
----------------------------------

3D Games presents " IL-2 Shturmovik. Road to Berlin ", third part of the award winning "Ilyushin IL-2 Shturmovik ". Battle of Berlin was the final Soviet offensive of the European theatre of World War II.

" IL-2 Shturmovik. Road to Berlin " is powered by Unreal Engine technology. By using Epic Games' award-winning, most advanced game engine, our Combat Flight Simulator brings in the game such incredible detailed graphics, real-time lighting with a unique physics and weapon system that has not been here yet. You will not believe it's only a game for mobile devices!

FORGET EVERYTHING ELSE! THIS IS THE ULTIMATE WWII AIR-TO-GROUND COMBAT GAME!
With an extensive single player missions and the non-stop action will keep you at the edge of your seat! You’ll participate in fierce attacks on protected convoys of enemy's vehicles, tanks, bridges and even airfields. Everything is set up in accurately recreated locations.

Become the supreme lord of the skies!

CONSOLE QUALITY GAMING AND IT’S ONLY ON iOS!
Unparalleled visuals, special effects and audio including: specular masks, normal mapping, bump mapping, atmospheric scattering, realistic lighting, sun glare, high
definition textures, 4x anisotropic filtering, HDR rendering, radial blur and more!

OPTIMIZED ON THE NEW iPAD AIR 2 AND iPHONE 6
Optimized for iPhone 6 and iPad Air 2 with the new A8 processors with greater environmental detail, spectacular visual effects and unparalleled performance!

RESTRICTIONS
Due to the high quality graphics and demanding real-time physics calculations this game is not recommended for older devices including the iPhone 3GS, iPod Touch 1 and iPad 1
